winget.name: KeePass Password Safe 2
winget.description: KeePass is a free, open-source, lightweight, and easy-to-use password manager for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

winget.name: Bitwarden
winget.description: Bitwarden is a free and open-source password management service that stores sensitive information such as website credentials in an encrypted vault.

winget.name: 1Password
winget.description: 1Password is a password manager and digital wallet for Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android developed by AgileBits.

winget.name: LastPass
winget.description: LastPass is a freemium password management service that stores encrypted passwords in a secure vault.

winget.name: Dashlane
winget.description: Dashlane is a freemium password manager and digital wallet for Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android developed by Dashlane.

winget.name: KeeWeb
winget.description: KeeWeb is a free and open-source password manager compatible with KeePass.

winget.name: KeePassXC
winget.description: KeePassXC is a free and open-source password manager compatible with KeePass.

winget.name: Yubikey Manager
winget.description: YubiKey Manager is a cross-platform application for configuring your YubiKey.

winget.name: Yubiko Authenticator
winget.description: Yubico Authenticator is a cross-platform application for managing your YubiKeys.

winget.name: YubiKey Personalization Tool
winget.description: YubiKey Personalization Tool is a cross-platform application for configuring your YubiKey.

winget.name: AdGuard
winget.description: AdGuard is a cross-platform ad blocker and web filter developed by AdGuard Software.

winget.name: Malwarebytes
winget.description: Malwarebytes is a cross-platform anti-malware software developed by Malwarebytes Corporation.

winget.name: Webroot SecureAnywhere
winget.description: Webroot SecureAnywhere® AntiVirus protects you from online threats.

winget.name: Keeper® Password Manager
winget.description: Keeper is the top-rated password manager for protecting you, your family and your business from password-related data breaches and cyberthreats.
